website_summaries.verdict: This option generates high praise for both its high-end look and its sturdy quality, although some may wish for a deeper bowl.
pros: Great modern look and nice finish
Sink is heavy and constructed of quality material
cons: The bowl here is very shallow, which may cause some problems both in terms of drainage and splashing

customer_reviews.title: Love My Vessel Sink!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sink to replace my vessel bowl sink. I was a little worried at first because of dimensions. I don't regret it. I love my new sink. My husband had no problem to install it. It looks gorgeous!! I will update once I have used it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: ZurcD

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a sink. I ordered two. The only issue is that they are not perfectly square so setting up a double vanity with the two was a little problematic. They are made in China so enough said. Still pretty and a good price. They are installed and look lovely.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilke

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: they were perfect, word to the wise, when installing the drain remember to use plumbers putty, it's like 3$ at your local big box home improvement store, they will leak if you use only gaskets.
customer_reviews.author: Homeward

customer_reviews.title: Decent Low-Profile Vanity-top Vessel Sink
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the CS-023 model sink, which is oval-shaped and low profile. The sink has a nice smooth finish and sits well attop a vanity that has a small drain pipe opening through a slab. Standard pop-up type chrome drain works just fine - no leaks. It is odd that other models of this sink appear when clicking the link for a CS-023 sink. This may be a discontinued item. The beauty of this sink is the shallow depth, which allows installation on a "floating" or wall-attached cabinet while retaining standard fixture heights. We used wall-mounted fixtures in a small bathroom with good results. If there are issues within the next two years, I'll adjust the review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Alien Bitflipper

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price! We bought 2 of them to change our master vanity from one sink to two sinks. We chose these vessels, so we could keep the same cabinet, and still be able to use the drawers. Hubby didn't have any trouble installing them. The are nice and tight, and look great!
customer_reviews.author: P. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These turned out amazing in my guest bath. I ordered several different vessel sinks and none of them could accommodate my faucets because they came out of the wall. The installer and I came up with the idea to semi recess these and WOW they look so good I'm jealous in my master bath now.
customer_reviews.author: LuxuryLoverTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: A very good product at a very fair price. It was installed in minutes with adhesive. There was a small high spot on the bottom that I filed down. I used a Yodel Vessel Sink Pop Up Drain with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diablo Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Product is very good quality and priced. Installed this on top of my new bathroom vanity with no difficulty! Instructions were great and kit was complete! Would buy this product again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved the sink when I got it (bought two for ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sink when I got it (bought two for our bathroom), however they have been installed a year now and one does not drain very well so my husband took the stopper out and I dropped a glass in the other one and it made a big hold in it. Very think porcelain. I wouldn't suggest it for a child's bathroom or one that gets lots of use. I'm sick about the break and have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Farris

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. We ordered two and have installed one
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. We ordered two and have installed one. They look beautiful but the finish is already scratched off where my husband held the sink to keep it from moving while he tightened the faucet plumbing. Apparently it's impossible to get white sinks that will not scratch.
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: stunning sink
customer_reviews.text: heavy, good quality, and appears larger than I envisioned it to be. I am concerned it doesn't have an overflow valve, but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: genealogist Donna

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure your faucet is high enough to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure your faucet is high enough to get over the edge and that it sends the water far enough towards the drain, otherwise you just splash your countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B Kearns

customer_reviews.title: A good Buy, but some quality issues
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged, but there were no installation instructions - I'm doing the install. The base is not flat. One corner is higher than the other 3, so it required shimming on 3 of the 4 corners. The drain assembly is high quality. For the money a good buy, but I sure wish the bottom was level.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: love the modern look of my bathroom now
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these for my master bathroom, love the modern look of my bathroom now, just remember to get the drain valve, it doesn't come with it, picked two up at Home depot, wasn't a big deal, love it, love it, love it.!
customer_reviews.author: everythingnice

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, improved our bathroom sinks - great value at 1/3 price of the plumbing supply store
customer_reviews.text: Paid 1/3 price of the same item at the local plumbing supply store - same quality...they were amazed and a little embarrassed when I pointed the same item on their showroom that they were selling for around $150
customer_reviews.author: jw4

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for a bathroom remodel. Came well packaged, great finish and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Can’t complain about the price for what you get! I wish it would have come with a drain or options for a drain so we didn’t have to order it separately but they look good!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Behney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality ..Looks great in my double sink bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: These sinks were an awesome purchase. Vessel sinks from Home Depot, etc are at least $150. These arrived VERY securely packaged and right on time. I didn't notice anything in the product description, but they came with grid drains. Would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Solid and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This looks really great installed. Great value. I was worried about the lie height but have had no problems with splashing or water sloshing out of the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink.
customer_reviews.text: This sink gets a lot of compliments. I subtracted one star as the sides need to be several inches taller to prevent splashing onto the counter.
customer_reviews.author: GLENN GRAHAM

customer_reviews.title: 3 is a charm!
customer_reviews.text: The first 3 sinks were broken when delivered finally got 2 that were good. Returned the last one on 6/14 and nearly a month later i have not received a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Winslett

customer_reviews.title: ... second vessel bowl and we found them to be beautiful and of excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is our second vessel bowl and we found them to be beautiful and of excellent quality..

customer_reviews.title: Great sinks. We get a lot of wonderful comments ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sinks. We get a lot of wonderful comments on our bathroom due to the sleek view of these sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this vessel is so nice! we had to return it because we chose ...
customer_reviews.text: this vessel is so nice! we had to return it because we chose a different route but its so nice~
customer_reviews.author: keyry valladarez

customer_reviews.title: My new Zen Retreat....
customer_reviews.text: Sinks look great. After reading many of the reviews i was a little worried but very relieved when i received them. They seem to be a true square shape. Easy to install. Sturdy. Bright White. I just have to get used to the whole set up since we switched from a traditional bowl sink to the vessel. There were cheaper options but felt like going middle ground may be safer and it worked out for us!!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! A really good price. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice! Just have to be careful not to lean ...
customer_reviews.text: It was not level to sit directly on countertop. However when drain was inserted and tightened. It looks nice! Just have to be careful not to lean on it. Pretty sink.
customer_reviews.author: DDM

customer_reviews.title: Love the two vessel sinks.
customer_reviews.text: I love the two sinks. I have drilled the holes in the plywood and cement board and put the sinks in place with the drain to test the placement. I can't wait to finish the tile. I'm a 70 year old grandma doing this by myself and being successful. How cool is that? Installing with Antique Bronze Lavatory Vanity Vessel Sink faucet in Bamboo from Houseweety and Antique Bronze Pop up Drain from LightinTheBox.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great update
customer_reviews.text: Love these sinks. updated a guest bathroom form one to two sinks and wanted to get some height without having to remove the low 70's built in cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: It is

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We installed ours over 2 years ago. We really like these and recommend them we had no leaks, just rubber gaskets on the drains, no deffects, no quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: jpierce55

customer_reviews.title: This top mount sink is good size not too big or to deep
customer_reviews.text: This top mount sink is good size not too big or to deep. However did not sit flat has a little wobble that I had to shim.
customer_reviews.author: TONY P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and the price was great for the quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: I love this vessel it made my bathroom look so much brighter.

customer_reviews.text: its pretty small, and you will certainly have water splashing out of it.

customer_reviews.title: very happy about this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have received so many compliments on this sink! I shopped around and saw similar, more expensive sinks. I am very, very happy about this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and sleek, I have yet to install it but it looks and feels great.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you look at measurements
customer_reviews.text: This is not a deep bowl so it causes so issues with drainage.

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect sized sink
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect sized sink. The quality is better than expected for the price. I have now purchased them for two different bathrooms.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have not installed this item yet but did come in unbroken. Looks very high end. So far so good.

customer_reviews.text: Great looking product, no flaws in the finish. Packaged well, lots of foam and 2 boxes.

customer_reviews.title: Great sink at a great value!

customer_reviews.text: Liked the shape of it but it had a dimple in the china so sent it back. Would try it again because pretty but found another.

customer_reviews.title: A lovely, low-profile sink.
customer_reviews.text: Dropped the sink into the tile. Left about 2" above the tile. Love it, really love it. Now, my beautiful perfume bottles and a few of my favorite knick knacks grab your attention, rather than a large sink.

customer_reviews.text: Stylish and sleek, I love my sink. I also could not beat the price I paid for them!!

customer_reviews.title: This was so much better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: This was so much better than the picture.It looks amazing in our newly remodeled Bathroom for a fraction of what we would have paid at Lowes or Home Depot. We bought the fixture it came with and it is sturdy good looking and works wonderfully as always Amazon we love you!

customer_reviews.text: Received this on time. Packaging was great. The sink is beautiful. Looks exactly like photograph.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of them and everyone that has seen ...

customer_reviews.title: and they look and function great.

product_meta.title: Luxier CS-006 Bathroom Porcelain Ceramic Vessel Vanity Sink Art Basin
product_meta.description:
Style:CS-006Brand new modern contemporary ceramic vessel sink art basin. Premium Quality. Ideal for both home & commercial use.

Features:
- Sleek European inspired modern contemporary square style design
- Luxury oversized creation
- Premium quality ceramic construction
- Above the counter installation
- 2 Year Manufacturer Warranty (USA Only) w/ US Based Customer Service.

Compatible Faucet Type:
- Single hole tall vessel sink faucet. (Sold Separately)

Compatible Drain Type:
- Pop up drain stopper with No overflow (Sold Separately) 

Specification:
- Part Number: CS-006
- Color: White
- Dimension: 16" (Width) x 16" (Depth) x 4 ½" (Height)
- Design: Square
- Sink Material: Ceramic
- Overflow: No
- Installation Type: Above the counter
- Warranty: 2 Year (USA only) 

What's Included:
- Bathroom Ceramic Vessel Vanity Sink Art Basin
feature_bullets: Sleek European inspired modern contemporary design
Premium quality ceramic construction. Above the counter installation
Choice of Chrome, Brushed Nickel, or Oil Rubbed Bronze Pop-up drain (Sold Separately)
2 Year Manufacturer Warranty w/ US Based Customer Service.
